name: Roy Tang
text: There has to be a holistic approach - countryside development, improvement of public transportation systems, bike-friendly roads, community planning, work from home and carpooling initiatives from the private sector, proper enforcement of traffic rules, etc. The problem is that there is no coherent plan from the government and there are multiple entities involved (DOTC, LTFRB, LTO, MMDA, police, etc) so there's a tendency to pass responsibilitie s around
